mapper.select: select g.game_id, g.common_name game_name, g.filter_index, z.total from mug_game g left join (select k.game_id, count(1) total from mug_keyword k group by k.game_id) z on g.game_id = z.game_id where g.parent_id is null order by g.filter_index
select k.keyword_id, k.game_id, k.keyword, k.keyword_index from mug_keyword k where k.game_id = #{gameId} order by k.keyword_index
